means: 内心的，精神的，思想的，心理的
〈口〉精神病的，意志薄弱的，愚笨的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都表示"发疯的，精神错乱的"之意。
means: crazy ： 通俗用词，指极度的神经错乱或精神失常，也指对事物的狂势，失去自控能力。
mad ： 语气比crazy正式，但系普通用词。通常指人精神狂乱，完全不能自我控制的一种病态。
mental ： 通常指患有精神病的。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均有"精神的"之意。
means: mental ： 侧重指某人对周围环境所具有的内心，情绪上及智力方面的反映。
spiritual ： 侧重人内心深处的思维对客观事物的反映，而不是人的身体对事物的反应而构成人的精神因素。

sentence.Network_en: The woman will be confined to a mental institution.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个女人将被关进精神病院。

sentence.Network_en: Attitudes to mental illness have shifted in recent years.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近几年对精神病的态度已有所改变。

sentence.Network_en: He hanged himself two hours after arriving at a mental hospital.
sentence.Network_cn: 在到精神病医院两小时后他就上吊自杀了。

means.word_mean: 神经错乱的,失常的,古怪的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin mentalis, from Latin mens, ment- 'mind'

entry.def: Mental means relating to the process of thinking.
Mental means relating to the state or the health of a person's mind.

example.ex: The mental state that had created her psychosis was no longer present.
example.tran: 导致她精神失常的那种心理状态已经消失了。

entry.tran: 内心的;在头脑中进行的
entry.def: A mental act is one that involves only thinking and not physical action.

example.ex: Practise mental arithmetic when you go out shopping...
example.tran: 外出购物的时候练习一下心算。

example.ex: Graham made a quick mental calculation.
example.tran: 格雷厄姆很快就心算出来了。

entry.def: If you say that someone is mental, you mean that you think they are mad.

example.ex: I just said to him 'you must be mental'.
example.tran: 我刚才对他说：“你一定是疯了。”

entry.tran: 记在脑子里;把…牢记在心
entry.def: If you make a mental note of something, you make an effort to store it in your memory so that you will not forget it.

example.ex: She made a mental note to have his prescription refilled.
example.tran: 她记着要拿他的处方再配一回药。

example.ex: She made a mental note not to sit anywhere near him.
example.tran: 她心里牢牢记着不坐在他的附近。

means.word_mean: 1. involving the mind or an intellectual process;
2. of or relating to the mind;
3. of or relating to the chin- or lip-like structure in insects and certain mollusks
4. of or relating to the chin or median part of the lower jaw
5. affected by a disorder of the mind;

list.explanation: 神经官能症患者，精神病患者

example.en: A: What's to prevent him from going? B: He is a mental job.
example.zh: 甲:什么能阻碍他，不让他去呢? 乙:他有精神病啊。

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I didn't say it leads to mental illness.

auth_sentence.res_content: Empathy does not lead to depression or mental illness.

auth_sentence.res_content: Cassie has a breakdown brought on by mental illness.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 焦躁不安的,失去理智的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+ment思考,神智+ed……的→去掉理智

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神的,思想的,心理的,智力的,脑力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ment思考,神智+al……的→adj.精神的,思想的,心理的,智力的,脑力的
a无+ment思考,神智+ia病→无智力的病
com共同+ment思考,神智→共同思考→评论[词性变化:可作动词]
comment注释+ary表名词→n.注释, 解说词
mental精神的+ity表名词→n.心理,意识

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神作用,心理状态,心智活动
stems_affixes.word_buile: ment心智+ation表名词→n.精神作用,心理状态,心智活动
ment思考,神智+ion表名词→有思考→向导,提到[词性变化:作动词]
com共同+ment思考,神智→共同思考→评论[词性变化:可作动词]
comment[n.注释,评论,意见 v.[on]注释,评论]+ate表动词→v.作实况报道,评述

Sentence.sentence: There's a flip side, however, as partners are more likely to become ill or die in the couple of years following their spouse's death, and caring for a spouse with mental disorder can leave you with some of the same severe problems.
She has developed some serious mental problem.
They contribute to physical and mental health.
Granted, these producers'avings probably translate into lower prices at the grocery store, but how many consumers make that mental connection at the checkout counter

means.word_mean: 精神的, 头脑的, 心理的, 智力的

sentences.en: His mental abilities are very good.
A mental hospital has just been set up here.
sentences.cn: 这里刚刚建成一座精神病医院。

jushi.english: He has better mental powers than I.
The teacher will exam our ability by a mental test.
jushi.chinese: 老师将通过一个智力测验检查我们的能力。

jushi.english: His mental abilities are very good.
